items.outcome: 1. Understand processes and technical skills used in creative media production.
items.criteria: Apply understanding of a range of processes to support media activities.
items.Pass: You have applied a suitable level of understanding to a range of skills during this project and produced a satisfactory amount of work. I can see some improvement throughout the project.
items.Good: You have applied a good level of understanding to a range of skills during this project and produced a consistent amount of work. I can see improvement throughout the project.
items.Excellent: You have applied an excellent level of understanding to a range of skills during this project and produced a professional amount of work. I can see a substantial improvement throughout the project.

items.criteria: Apply media processes and skills safely and appropriately.
items.Pass: You have identified and followed health and safety precautions.
items.Good: You have clearly identified and followed health and safety precautions.
items.Excellent: You have clearly identified and followed health and safety precautions.

items.outcome: 2. Understand the characteristics and methods of communication within a media context.
items.criteria: Critically compare a range of communication methods used to convey meaning in creative media production.
items.Pass: You have evaluated and annotated your research, planning and development suitably and shown some development in your practical ability as a result.
items.Good: You have evaluated and annotated your research, planning and development and shown good improvements in your practical ability as a result.
items.Excellent: You have evaluated and annotated your research, planning and development and shown excellent improvements in your practical ability as a result.

items.outcome: 1. Understand design and research tools, methods and skills used in creative media production.
items.criteria: Critically compare a range of research tools, methods and skills.
items.Pass: You have defined and explained different research and Design skills and methods to a satisfactory level.
items.Good: You have defined and explained different research and Design skills and methods to a good level.
items.Excellent: You have defined and explained different research and Design skills and methods to an excellent level.

items.outcome: 2. Understand primary and secondary research sources.
items.criteria: Critically compare a range of primary and secondary research sources.
items.Pass: Your comparison of the research sources was suitable with some considerations and comparisons made.
items.Good: Your comparison of the research sources was good with some considerations and comparisons made.
items.Excellent: Your comparison of the research sources was excellent with detailed considerations and comparisons made.

items.outcome: 3. Be able to use design and research tools, methods and skills to inform ideas for creative media production.
items.criteria: Apply design and research tools, methods and skills to record and interpret information and develop ideas for creative production.
items.Pass: You have applied design and research tools and methods to a satisfactory level by researching and developing ideas for a series of design outcomes.
items.Good: You have applied design and research tools and methods to a good level by researching and developing some interesting ideas for a series of design outcomes.
items.Excellent: You have applied design and research tools and methods to an excellent level by researching and developing some unique ideas for a series of design outcomes.

items.criteria: Evaluate the effectiveness of design and research tools methods and skills to develop ideas for creative production.
items.Pass: Your comparison of the research & design methods and skills was suitable with a number of considerations and comparisons made.
items.Good: Your comparison of the research & design methods and skills was good with a number of considerations and comparisons made.
items.Excellent: Your comparison of the research & design methods and skills was excellent with a number of considerations and comparisons made.

items.outcome: 1. Understand progression opportunities within the creative media sector.
items.criteria: Locate, access and use information to support own development.
items.Pass: Satisfactory location, access and use of games industry job research which shows an understanding of progression opportunities.
items.Good: Good location, access and use of games industry job research which shows an understanding of progression opportunities.
items.Excellent: Excellent location, access and use of games industry job research which shows an understanding of progression opportunities.

items.outcome: 2. Understand the skills needed to pursue a career in the creative media sector.
items.criteria: Critically evaluate a range of working practices and methods.
items.Pass: Satisfactory critical evaluation and understanding of skills needed for a job within the games industry.
items.Good: Good critical evaluation and understanding of skills needed for a job within the games industry.
items.Excellent: Excellent critical evaluation and thorough understanding of skills needed for a job within the games industry.

items.criteria: Apply knowledge of working practices to support own development.
items.Pass: You have used a satisfactory level of knowledge from the skills sessions to explore and develop suitable ideas for a series of design outcomes.
items.Good: You have used a good level of knowledge from the skills sessions to explore and develop informed ideas for a series of design outcomes.
items.Excellent: You have used an excellent level of knowledge from the skills sessions to explore and develop imaginative ideas for a series of design outcomes.

items.outcome: 3. Be able to carry out roles and responsibilities consistent with professional practice.
items.criteria: Organise self and work to meet deadlines and targets.
items.Pass: All work was handed in on time and all tasks were completed to a satisfactory standard.
items.Good: All work was handed in on time and all tasks were completed to a good standard.
items.Excellent: All work was handed in on time and all tasks were completed to an excellent standard.

items.criteria: Demonstrate consideration and professionalism in working with others.
items.Pass: You worked well during all group activities and provided suitable feedback during the numerous peer review opportunities.
items.Good: You worked well during all group activities and provided good feedback during the numerous peer review opportunities.
items.Excellent: You worked well during all group activities and provided excellent feedback during the numerous peer review opportunities.

items.outcome: 1. Understand critical perspectives that influence the analysis of creative media production.
items.criteria: Compare a range of critical perspectives that influence the analysis of creative media production activities.
items.Pass: You have shown satisfactory evidence that you have understood and compared a range of critical perspectives that influence games development including violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities.
items.Good: You have shown good evidence that you have understood and compared a range of critical perspectives that influence games development including violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities.
items.Excellent: You have shown excellent evidence that you have understood and compared a range of critical perspectives that influence games development including violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities.

items.criteria: Apply knowledge of critical perspectives to the analysis of a range of creative media production activities.
items.Pass: You have shown a satisfactory knowledge and understanding of violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities by looking at the representation of characters.
items.Good: You have shown a good knowledge and understanding of violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities by looking at the representation of characters.
items.Excellent: You have shown excellent knowledge and understanding of violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities by looking at the representation of characters.

items.criteria: Apply knowledge and understanding of critical perspectives to support own practice.
items.Pass: You have tried to consider critical perspectives whilst creating your work enabling you to produce assets and products which fit the audience they are designed for in some areas.
items.Good: You have clearly considered critical perspectives whilst creating your work enabling you to produce assets and products fit for the audience they are designed for.
items.Excellent: You have very clearly considered critical perspectives whilst creating your work enabling you to produce assets and products fit for the audience they are designed for.

items.outcome: 2. Understand the contexts within which creative media technology and production are positioned.
items.criteria: Critically compare a range of contexts within which creative media technology and production are situated.
items.Pass: You have shown a satisfactory knowledge and understanding of violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities by critically comparing 3 games.
items.Good: You have shown a good knowledge and understanding of violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities by critically comparing 3 games.
items.Excellent: You have shown excellent knowledge and understanding of violence, equality and diversity and the representation of minorities by critically comparing 3 games.

items.criteria: Apply an understanding of a range of contextual parameters to support own creative development.
items.Pass: You have tried to consider critical perspectives whilst creating your work enabling you to produce assets and products which fit the audience they are designed for in some areas.
items.Good: You have clearly considered critical perspectives whilst creating your work enabling you to produce assets and products fit for the audience they are designed for.
items.Excellent: You have very clearly considered critical perspectives whilst creating your work enabling you to produce assets and products fit for the audience they are designed for.
